bib.title: Context-sensitive sentiment propagation in WordNet
bib.author: Koco{\'n}, Jan and Janz, Arkadiusz and Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: In this paper we present a comprehensive overview of recent methods of the sentiment propagation in a wordnet. Next, we propose a fully automated method called Classifier-based Polarity Propagation, which utilises a very rich set of features, where most of them are based on wordnet relation types, multi-level bag-of-synsets and bag-of-polarities. We have evaluated our solution using manually annotated part of plWordNet 3.1 emo, which contains more than 83k manual sentiment annotations, covering more than 41k synsets. We have
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 9th Global Wordnet Conference
